strings.LMaxLevel: The maximum signal level to start recording:
strings.LMaxLevelInterrupt: The number of operations to the maximum level to start recording:
strings.LMinLevel: Minimum signal for the start of auto-recognition:
strings.LEMinLevelInterrupt: The number of positives to a minimum standard for the start of auto-recognition:
strings.CBStopRecordActionItems1: Stop recording on the minimum signal level
strings.CBStopRecordActionItems2: Stop, recognize and run with the minimum signal level
strings.CBStopRecordActionItems3: Stop recording without the minimum signal level
strings.CBStopRecordActionItems4: Stop, recognize and run without the minimum signal level
strings.CBEnableSendText: Enable transmission of the text in the input field of other programs
strings.GBSendText: Setting the transmission of the text in the input fields other programs
strings.LClassName: Class input fields of the recipient:
strings.LNote: WARNING! The recognized text will be sent only to the active window. Class input field can be left blank or specify using the optional SearchApplicationClassName.exe
strings.HotKeyAlredyUses: This hot key is already in use!
